title: How Awful About Allan
description: "That's what they all say about me and it's true. I used to be one of the sane ones. But now I'm a galloping maniac. Worse, I'm the only paranoiac, schizophrenic, manic-depressive in the neighborhood.What they don't know is that since I'm home from the state hospital I see things a lot more clearly. I know now what they're up to. I know-sure as I know I'm mad-that they're planning to kill me."
author: Henry Farrell
